review_blob: Dark in color with a milky creamy head. Starts with a floral fruity note and first sip is just that. Then moves to a smokey almost stout like flavor but still very smooth. Finally finishing with a hint if bitterness. This hop combination is very subtle for an IPA but somehow works well here.

Light yet not to light. This beer has an almost floral taste at first then moves into a nice hoppy bite. The color Id light almost the color if an light lager. Overall very good beer. Im interested in trying more from this Brewery.
Thus was the first Floyds Ive had. Really enjoyed it. Great color and lacing. The taste was lighter then expected but flavorful.
beer_name: Three Floyds Robert The Bruce Scottish Ale

review_blob: Really solid IPA. Fairly light and floral initially but has a great hoppey bite. With an abv of 6 its on par with many sessions brews but much more flavor.
